title: Deploy current draft version live
constraints: Deployment-only: do not change application functionality or UI as part of publishing (per frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md).
Respect existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Refactoring backend data models or storage.
Changing styling/theme, copy, or UX flows.
Introducing new CI/CD tooling or external infrastructure.
